00041 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::setCaption(const char* caption){
00042   if (strlen(caption)==0){
00043     LOGW("You are setting an empty caption");
00044   }
00045   this->m_caption=caption;
00046 }

00053 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::getCaption(){
00054   return this->m_caption;
00055 }

00062 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::add(OptionButton* ob){
00063   if (ob)
00064     buttonList.push_back(ob);
00065   else 
00066     LOGW ("You are adding a NULL OptionButton pointer");
00067 }

00104 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton* 
00105 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::getButtonByName(const char* n){
00106 
00107   OptionButton* ret=NULL;
00108 
00109   tOptionButtonList::const_iterator iter;
00110 
00111   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00112   for (iter=buttonList.begin(); iter != buttonList.end(); iter++){
00113     const char*name=(*iter)->getCaption();
00114 
00115     if (strcmp(name, n)==0)
00116       ret=(*iter);
00117 
00118   }
00119 
00120   return ret;
00121 
00122 
00123 }

00132 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::update(){
00133 
00134   tOptionButtonList::const_iterator iter;
00135   
00136   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00137   for (iter=buttonList.begin(); iter != buttonList.end(); iter++){
00138     (*iter)->update();
00139   }
00140 }
